spec_data.Name: bitstream-vera-fonts-common
spec_data.Description:
The Vera fonts are high-quality Latin fonts donated by Bitstream.
These fonts have been released under a liberal license, see the
licensing FAQ in COPYRIGHT.TXT or the online up-to-date version
at http://www.gnome.org/fonts/ for details.

This package consists of files used by other bitstream-vera-fonts packages.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:06:44 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Common files of the Bitstream Vera font set
